plugins.prepareCmd: bun run build && bun run build:bin

plugins.successCmd: sed -i.bak 's/version ".*"/version "${nextRelease.version}"/' homebrew-tap-files/Formula/ocsight.rb && rm -f homebrew-tap-files/Formula/ocsight.rb.bak && for bin in ocsight-macos-x64 ocsight-macos-arm64 ocsight-linux-x64 ocsight-linux-arm64; do if [ -f \"$bin\" ]; then zip \"ocsight-${bin//macos/darwin}.zip\" \"$bin\"; fi; done
